languages.text: Я был в конвое одной из групп техножрецов, прорвавшихся в док для техносаботажа. Одно дело — смотреть, как техномат окуривает кадилом когитатор на грузовой палубе, другое — наблюдать за сакральными ритуалами техножрецов, проводимыми под градом пуль и ковровыми бомбардировками.

traits.locale_text: Я был в конвое одной из групп техножрецов, прорвавшихся в док для техносаботажа. Одно дело смотреть, как техномат окуривает кадилом над когитатором на палубе, другое — наблюдать за сакральными ритуалами техножрецов под градом пуль и ковровыми бомбардировками.

languages.text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.
languages.original_text: Я был в конвое одной из групп техножрецов, прорвавшихся в док для техносаботажа. Одно дело — смотреть, как техномат окуривает кадилом когитатор на грузовой палубе, другое — наблюдать за сакральными ритуалами техножрецов, проводимыми под градом пуль и ковровыми бомбардировками.

It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but it's another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but it's another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but it's another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

languages.text: 技术神甫的队伍闯入了船坞，执行破坏任务，而我是其中一支队伍的护卫。在货舱甲板上看着那些技工在沉思者旁边挥舞香炉是一回事，而在枪林弹雨与地毯式轰炸之下观看神圣的技术仪式，则又是另一回事了。
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

traits.locale_text: 技术祭司的队伍闯入了船坞，执行破坏任务，而我是其中一支队伍的护卫。在货舱甲板上看着那些技工在思考器旁边挥舞香炉是一回事，而在枪林弹雨与地毯式轰炸之下观看神圣的技术仪式，则又是另一回事了。

languages.text: Je faisais partie de l'escorte de l'un des groupes de technoprêtres qui se sont introduits sur le quai pour la mission de sabotage. Regarder un technomate agiter un encensoir au-dessus d'un cogitateur sur un pont de chargement, c'est une chose ; mais observer des technorituels sacrés sous une pluie de balles et de bombes... L'expérience était incroyable.
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

traits.locale_text: Je faisais partie de l'escorte de l'un des groupes de technoprêtres qui se sont introduits sur le quai pour la mission de sabotage. Regarder un technomate agiter un encensoir au-dessus d'un cogitateur sur un pont de chargement, c'est une chose ; mais observer des technorituels sacrés sous une pluie de balles et de bombes... L'expérience était incroyable.

languages.text: 私は破壊工作を実行するためにドックに侵入した技術司祭クルーの護衛の一員だった。テクノマットが貨物甲板で考算機に香炉を振りかけるのを見るのもひとつの楽しみだが、銃弾と絨毯爆撃の雨の中で神聖な技術儀式が執り行われるのを観察するのもある種楽しめた。
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

traits.locale_text: 私は破壊工作を実行するためにドックに侵入した技術司祭クルーの護衛の一員だった。テクノマットが貨物甲板で考算機に香炉を振りかけるのを見るのもひとつの楽しみだが、銃弾と絨毯爆撃の雨の中で神聖な技術儀式が執り行われるのを観察するのもある種楽しめた。

languages.text: Formé parte de la escolta de uno de los equipos de tecnosacerdotes que entraron al puerto para la misión de sabotaje. Una cosa es ver a un tecnómata agitar un incensario sobre el cogitador de una cubierta de carga y otra muy distinta es verle celebrar sus sagrados rituales tecnológicos bajo una tempestad de plomo y bombas.
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

traits.locale_text: Formé parte de la escolta de uno de los equipos de tecnosacerdotes que entraron al puerto para la misión de sabotaje. Una cosa es ver a un tecnómata agitar un incensario sobre el cogitador de una cubierta de carga y otra muy distinta es verle celebrar sus sagrados rituales tecnológicos bajo una tempestad de plomo y bombas.

languages.text: Ich war Teil der Eskorte für eine der Techpriester-Crews, die in das Dock einbrachen, um die Sabotagemission durchzuführen. Es ist eine Sache, einem Technomaten zuzusehen, wie er auf einem Frachtdeck ein Rauchgefäß schwenkt. Aber eine ganz andere, heilige Techrituale zu erleben, die unter einem Hagel von Kugeln und Flächenbombardierungen durchgeführt werden.
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.

traits.locale_text: Ich war Teil der Eskorte für eine der Techpriester-Crews, die in das Dock einbrachen, um die Sabotagemission durchzuführen. Es ist eine Sache, einem Technomaten zuzusehen, wie er auf einem Frachtdeck ein Rauchgefäß schwenkt. Aber eine ganz andere, heilige Techrituale zu erleben, die unter einem Hagel von Kugeln und Flächenbombardierungen durchgeführt werden.

languages.text: Rıhtıma sızarak sabotajı gerçekleştirecek Tekno Rahip mürettebatına refakat edenler arasındaydım. Bir teknomatın kargo güvertesindeki herhangi bir kavramsayara karşı buhurdan sallamasını izlemek ayrı, mermi yağmuru ve sistematik bombardıman altında kutsal tekno ayinlerin düzenlenişine tanık olmak ayrıydı.
languages.original_text: I was part of the escort for one of the Tech-Priest crews that broke into the dock to carry out the sabotage mission. It's one thing to watch a technomat wave a censer over a cogitator on a cargo deck, but another to observe sacred tech-rituals being performed under a hail of bullets and carpet bombings.
